edu.asu.spring.quadriga.service

Interface IUserManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockupUserManager, UserManager

    public interface IUserManager
    Interface class that places restraints on the UserManager class to implement the required behaviors.
    Author:
    Ram Kumar Kumaresan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addNewUser(User newUser)
      Method to add a new active user to the existing active user list in Quadriga database.
      int deleteUser(java.lang.String sUserId)
      Method to deactivate the user account in Quadriga database.
      IUser getUserDetails(java.lang.String sUserId)
      Method which creates a user object for the given userId.
      java.lang.String updateUserDetails(User existingUser)
      Method to update the user details.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserDetails

        IUser getUserDetails(java.lang.String sUserId)
        Method which creates a user object for the given userId.
        Parameters:
        sUserId - The unique userid of the user
        Returns:
        User object created based on the userId

      • updateUserDetails

        java.lang.String updateUserDetails(User existingUser)
        Method to update the user details.
        Parameters:
        existingUser - The user object corresponding to the authenticated user.
        Returns:
        String which indicates the operations status.

      • deleteUser

        int deleteUser(java.lang.String sUserId)
        Method to deactivate the user account in Quadriga database.
        Parameters:
        sUserId - The unique userid of the user
        Returns:
        Integer to indicate the operation status. 0 - Success. 1 - Already Inactive user. -1 - Error in performing the operation

      • addNewUser

        int addNewUser(User newUser)
        Method to add a new active user to the existing active user list in Quadriga database.
        Parameters:
        newUser - The user object which contains the details of the user to be added to Quadriga database.
        Returns:
        Integer to indicate the operation status. 0 - Success. 1 - Userid is taken. -1 - Error in performing the operation
